properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 11:25AM EST until January 8 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Berks County in eastern Pennsylvania...

* Until noon EST.

* At 1125 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located over Bernville,
or 10 miles northeast of Myerstown, moving east at 55 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in heavy snow.

SOURCE...Radar and webcams.

IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.

* This includes the following highways...
Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 10 and 25.
Pennsylvania Turnpike near exit 298.
Interstate 176 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 1 and 11.

Locations impacted include...
Reading, Wyomissing, Birdsboro, Fleetwood, Sinking Spring,
Laureldale, Womelsdorf, Wernersville, Newmanstown, Leesport,
Shoemakersville, Elverson, Bally, Bernville, Bechtelsville,
Strausstown, New Morgan, Spring Ridge, Fairview Hgts and Shillington.
properties.instruction:
Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 12:00 PM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
